Usually, once you're inside a building, you can go anywhere. Zero Trust is like a building where you need to show your ID badge at EVERY door, even inside! You can't just walk around freely - you have to prove who you are at each step.

In this lesson, we'll learn about zero trust architecture principles in a way that makes sense. We'll start simple, use real examples, and build your understanding step by step. By the end, you'll understand the core ideas and why they matter!
